# R Packages

This chapter lists all the packages necessary for plotting

## Data processing

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Graph arrangement 

```{r}
library(patchwork)
```

## Data packages

```{r, drone}
library(drone)
library(tibble)
data("worldbankdata")
worldbankdata
```



### Time series data
